definition: Examination Yuan, the qualification and appointment board under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan/exam board
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

sentences.english: So the Ministry of Examinations and the National Examination Center are right next to the University?
sentences.chinese: 原来考试院和国家考场就在学校附近。

sentences.english: At the same time, the provincial hospital entrance examination each of the sites will send inspectors.
sentences.chinese: 同时，省招生考试院将向每一个考点派出巡视员。

definition: to advertise an entrance examination for an academic institution (old)
the exam area/the district where an exam takes place
horizontal line (in a fraction)/minimum passing score
exam candidate/student whose name has been put forward for an exam
to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam/to admit (a student)/to hire (a job candidate)
